caption: Great indoor place to play, kids will love it. Just needs improvement on safety specially on the moto driving area

My children love this place! I do too as it allows me to sit alone for once while they play. The play area is huge, with a vast amount of activities to do, which a lot of parents will greatly appreciate as children are never bored here and spend massive amounts of energy in the process. I'm lucky enough to live close to here! It's well priced, entry isn't too expensive and food is fairly balanced too. You can book birthday parties here, I've not yet experienced one, however there are 4 different party areas. An overall pleasure to come here as a parent with two highly energetic children.

Great place for kids. There were quite a lot of kids there but it wasn‚Äôt too crowded. It was extremely noisy and there‚Äôs no place for parents to go without noise which could have been good. The food options were quite good and price was acceptable. Parking is a little limited when it gets busy.
Fun, safe, exciting for 6 year olds especially, no chsrge for carers, 11 euros per child and we stayed 3 hours. Staff very helpful. Clean place, snacks available.
Good place for kids to have fun especially birthday package .
Very nice for kids to play... They do not allow to enter with food or drinks .. All entrance should take out shoes and put them in a basket
indoor playgound for kids.. well airconditioned during this summer season... food and refreshment also available inside
Nice indoor playground! Not so expensive. Big parking lot
A bit crowded on Saturday, but a fun place for your kids
Safe enough to let them roam free :)
Very nice play area for kids.
U can't breathe inside very bad experience

Very nice and friendly place. Very good for exhausted our toddlers üëåüòä I recommend this place for your young and old üòâüëç ‚Ä¶

Perfect place to celebrate my daughter's 7th birthday who loved it! A preference for morning hours which are quieter, fewer people and therefore more space for the little ones. A big thank you to the host Alya who is very smiling, dynamic and who put together lots of nice activities for us. At the top! I recommend despite the negative Google reviews‚Ä¶ It all depends on the schedules and the facilitators! I recommend!

Horrible experience. In addition to the rules that no one respects, it is teenagers who manage the center. A birthday having taken place, they played loud music (I myself had earache for a while afterwards) totally unsuitable (not for children). To avoid a ruptured eardrum, I had to leave my 17 month old baby straight away. Since when are 19 year olds running this site??? Avoid for the safety of children.

Lack of staff, the young man finds himself welcoming and taking orders for the catering. Extremely hot place Air conditioning would be necessary in this kind of place! Otherwise nice place for children!

I want to share how amazing my son's birthday was at Royal-Kids, thanks to the host Wasim. Everything was perfect, and the atmosphere was incredible! He is a very respectful and attentive person. He does not hesitate to laugh with the children and does everything to ensure that they have fun with joy and good humor, while ensuring their safety. I highly recommend his services to anyone looking to host a memorable party. Thanks again, Wasim!

When I came to book for my son's birthday, I was quite perplexed. I found the place crowded and noisy but went for it anyway. And honestly no regrets. The young people who host the birthday parties are really very involved, very smiling and friendly (special mention to Amine who hosted our son's to perfection). The children have fun, exercise and have a good time and that's exactly why we go to this kind of place. Thanks to the team, really nothing to say

Poor welcome staff lack of professionalism very expensive food 10 euros for a mini burger!! And if you forgot your socks you have to pay 16 euros per pair lol because it's forbidden to return without them I understand but at this price it's very exaggerated frankly!!! it's a shame because the space is very beautiful, bright and well ventilated

I just spent the afternoon with my son. Despite a problem with the door not closing well...(Repairable by a company) I complained to the Royal Kid staff because it was very cold I had to put on my down jacket and socks it was really limited... limit. I wonder how anyone can let their staff work in between 10/15¬∞C, working conditions that we should not accept. I came several times in winter, it was never so cold.... If you are the manager of the premises and you read my comment please do what is necessary because I find that you do not respect your staff as well as your customers which in my opinion brings you a more than responsible quality of life.

For my son's birthday I chose royal kids and I am delighted. Top entertainment with Wissam whom I thank enormously for having managed 10 children well from start to finish (gift time) and respected the timing well. The children were very happy I recommend you

Very friendly welcome from a young man with curly hair, then from his colleague when we left. The place is clean and well maintained. The doors are locked remotely and children cannot go out alone, which is very safe. Forgotten socks cost 2 euros, at least in size 27-31. Big downside however is having to pay 2 euros if there is more than one accompanying adult to sit on a plastic chair üòÖ. Frozen 4 cheese pizza but very good, very nice afternoon despite everything.

I celebrated my daughter's birthday on 11/27/2024. Honestly, the welcome was top notch. The mascot was so awesome, the entertainers were there from until the end, even at the time of the gifts. I recommend you. And I thank SOUMAYA AND WACINE ü§úüèºü§õüèº‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è Hearts on you. ‚Ä¶

Big disappointment for my daughter's birthday... formula with "entertainer" the young lady was of no use I spent my time doing her job. Sometimes she gathered the children and there was not the main one concerned, moreover no "link" with the children... did not ask their first name at the beginning to install the frame etc... in short expensive for nothing I think we need to find a competent facilitator. Really a shame almost 300‚Ç¨ spent and I got tired LOL I might as well do it at home. It's a place that I visit very often on weekends or school holidays and I have never had to complain but it was abused

Good morning. I just celebrated my daughter's birthday and noticed a lot of bad publicity and communication on your part and within your team. It would be good to review your rules given the price. Came the day before for information with the list, I learned that we cannot choose the colors of the rooms which was not too serious given the day, the room was really basic. Then they explain to me the group makeup price: 25 euros per group and the tag: 3.50 per child. I check the boxes and I am told that the form must be returned 5 minutes before the birthday. Birthday day makeup group rate 25 euros not possible because you had to book before the makeup artist will not have time üò° Then 2 parents wanted to stay coming from far away so asked if they could pay 2 euros as stipulated on your leaflets. Answer may not be possible because there are no places ü§¨ It will be necessary to stipulate in your advertisement following places entered 2 euros for adults limited places. During the entertainment, too much time was spent playing bracelets and the cake was served just 15 minutes before the end. I describe the icing on the cake to you at 6 p.m. the parents came to collect their children and without knowing I brought in a mother with a son so at the end of the birthday. A young employee tells me I'm going to write it down, I hear it, I go to the information and I'm told that the child who has just returned to pick up his sister with his mother must pay 20.90 and that was the ruleüò° They'll get it to me before he stays outside for 5 minutes. This made me crazy and still I remained very correct and if he had been caught I would have caused a scandal. I made royal kids ones that were larger and not more expensive. This is the first time to please a mother but certainly the last time if there is no improvement on your part and within your team because I only see the money side of you.

A total disappointment The floor is very dirty and clearly not maintained, while we are forced to take off our shoes. This is unacceptable! In addition, when you make your comments known to the staff, they are not only completely indifferent, but also unpleasant. No consideration for customers. This is a place to escape!!!

First visit with my 3 children including a baby (strollers prohibited, think cozy) It was great: With several slides and trampolines, a giant Lego area and lots of places to climb, the children had a blast!! It is clean and well ventilated, the central area for parents is large and bright, the price of drinks is not excessive, the staff is smiling and friendly. I highly recommend coming in the morning or even as soon as it opens because it is relatively calm (see photos) and less hot in summer. We will come back for sure!
